name: Chain 'em!
description:
Tap or hold to make a chain - chain 3+ gems horizontally, vertically or diagonally to score! Build mad chains with colored gems, link between colors using special multicolor gems and use special powers.

You can right-click to stop chain and press 1-5 keys for abilities. Also has mobile support - scroll with two fingers.

This is a game I made for no reason at all in, like, 3 weeks. Let this just be here, not that it's that bad.
